title: Heatwave Conditions to Abate Across India Starting May 21; Wet Spell Over Northwestern States Until May 24: IMD | The Weather Channel - Articles from The Weather Channel | weather.com - The Weather Channel
content:

description: This would serve as a welcome break from the severe heatwaves that seared scattered pockets of Himachal Pradesh, Delhi, Uttar Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh and Punjab on Friday. - Articles from The Weather Channel | weather.com
